resources.string: Let\'s enjoy a short tour in Egypt and Tunisia with all their beautiful landmarks and learn about the two different cultures
Learn about the rapprochement between the two cultures and the magic of the past and present.
Both countries are archaeological and attractive to tourists due to the natural beauty, imagination and creativity of the ancients in both countries.
Let\'s get to know each other very interesting countries.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
